channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on The Hidden Port

item.title: AWS Incident Response Playbook Template
item.description: A ready-to-use template for small security teams handling security incidents in AWS. Includes triage checklists, memory capture steps, and reporting structure.

item.title: Incident Response in AWS: A Playbook for Small Security Teams
item.description: A practical guide to incident response in AWS for small teams. Includes step-by-step playbook, memory acquisition techniques, and evidence handling in the cloud.
